articles.title: South Africa files case at ICJ accusing Israel of ‘genocidal acts’ in Gaza - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Israel, which has been accused of meting out collective punishment on Palestinians, rejects the case at the UN court.
articles.content: South Africa has filed a case against Israel at the International Court of Justice (ICJ), accusing it of crimes of genocide against Palestinians in Gaza after nearly three months of relentless Israel… [+7107 chars]
